radiographic_examinations.findings: The subject's MC4R gene exhibited an abnormal conformer with a double band derived from the 5/H11032SspI fragment.
Both wild-type (wt) and /H900488–92 myc-MC4Rs are expressed well on the cell surface.
The /H900488–92 MC4R is completely devoid of ligand binding and does not generate cAMP in response to agonist stimulation.
